sequence:
Lively Afternoon Tea Party I

<size=45>「Ladies At 3 O’Clock」</size>

scripts.say: Ding Dong~ Let’s begin our afternoon tea party!
Wait a minute, before we start I have a question. Why are we holding a tea party?
Typical, a Royal Navy maid wishes to know of our intentions? The reason is—— only meant for adults to know!

We're holding a tea party for all those hard working sisters out in the cold in order to warm them up. So no matter how tired everyone gets, {namecode:14} will be here to greet everyone with a pot of hot tea!
I hope I get an opportunity to help everyone relax. What’s more, some sisters are just constantly staying in their rooms lately...
{namecode:13} is not always staying in her room, {namecode:13} is merely just… hibernating! Yes, {namecode:13} is hibernating.
...Sister, you’re always telling half-truths, who’s going to believe you.
If you're always hiding in dark places with no light, then I'll get worried...
Naturally, {namecode:13} has got lamps in her room, so not to worry!
...Illustrious, besides {namecode:13}, where are those other introverted sisters?
Are you referring to the one from the North Union? Unfortunately, she is still a little shy to attend...
Just wait until winter, we’ll lure her out with a snowman.
And… Miss. Hood is not coming as well?
She and Prince of Wales were given a rare day off, so likely she won't have time to attend this tea party.
Ok, if I may interrupt this chit-chat, let’s get everyone to taste the traditional afternoon tea from the Sakura Empire.
Please have a try of {namecode:13}'s signature dish.
O, I’ve been highly anticipating this~
… O my, this taste——!!!
—— Why is this so bitter! My eyes are getting watery! There must be some kind of dark chocolate inside!
Hmm… so this is what matcha tastes like. It really is a unique flavour~
Huh, {namecode:11} did not come? She shouldn’t be on a mission today, right?
Sister...
—— She left a note and then headed out!
A note?
I won't attend this tea party without {namecode:12}!... {namecode:12}, just wait, I'll definitely come get you!
